content: all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 2 photography by westknits version 3 abbreviations co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together p purl p2tog purl 2 sts together pm place marker round/s round/s sl slip_stitch purl-wise unless instructed otherwise slm slip marker ssk slip slip knit slip first stitch knit-wise slip second stitch knit-wise knit those 2 sts together tbl st/s stitch/es tbl through back loop wyib with yarn in back wyif with yarn in front instructions cuff heel flap the sample features a contrast color for the cuff you watch this video to assist with the heel flap could use the same color for you cuff heel and toe or https //youtu be/krzignnbpjo try using different colors for these sections for fun color blocked socks this pattern is yours to customize with you will use half of your sts to do a garter stitch heel flap color so make them as simple or as crazy as you want 26 30 34 38 42 sts are used for the heel flap leave the using a different color for your cuff heel and toe is a remaining 26 30 34 38 42 sts on your needle to work great way to make sure you don t run out of yarn later if you want a contrast color heel then break your yarn and use a new color for row 1 watch this westknits video to assist with the german twisted co row 1 rs k25 29 33 37 41 sl1 wyif turn to work https //youtu be/k60rcmjjqiw ws row 2 ws k25 29 33 37 41 sl1 wyif turn to work co 52 60 68 76 84 sts using the german twisted co rs method place marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts if you are working with dpn s you repeat last 2 row 12 14 16 18 20 more times resulting can place a split ring marker in the cuff fabric to mark the in 13 15 17 19 21 garter ridges on the rs beginning of the round k2 p2 to end of round repeat last round 23 more times or until the ribbing measures approximately 2″ / 5cm you can knit the cuff ribbing as long as you want leg if you are making color blocked socks then break yarn and use a new color for the leg of your sock k all sts in the round until the leg reaches your desired length the sample sock measures approximately 6″ / 15cm from the co edge © 2023 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 3 photography by westknits version 3 heel turn row 1 rs k15 17 19 21 23 ssk k1 turn to work pattern repeat ws round 2 k to m slm work in pattern to m slm k to end of round row 2 ws sl1 purl-wise wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn to
